How to fix America overnight

protect the working class in America from being exploited by the rich.

Get money out of politics, and then pass an amendment preventing this from being able to happen ever again.

Go back to the tax code of Roosevelt. Progressive taxes on income, no capital gains. Tax on the the top 1% from %40 -%90

Prevent these big pharma and others, from creating monopolies, and jacking the prices of Aids medicine (like that Albanian turd did recently), Polio shots, etc.. however the fuck they want . Regulate the prices.

8. Secure the borders.
Yes, yes, I know, all the pc crowd will be butthurt about this, and all the Trump tards will praise me, but look reality is reality.
Until the day when there is not a single homeless veteran on our streets, or any other homeless guy, the borders should be closed to immigration. And then and only then, open them up, and only let in people who are at least semi educated, non extremist religitards, and should know how to speak English before they get here. As in the beginning we have to not only re balance, but redirect the budget. We have to break the hold of these big zionist banksters on wall street (yes, I said zionist you fucking asshole, cause thats what they are) crowd of Pnac (Project for the new american century, which is a plan for global zionist control, by getting rid of Iran,Syria,venezuela, and then Russia and China, Google it assholes) We have to get rid of these zionist military industrial complex and big banks. There is no reason why we shouldn't have a  base on the Moon by now.
10. Healthcare for all/Single payer. 

How do we pay for this? Pretty fucking easily actually, you fucking morons. Once you redirect the budget from policing the fucking world, and bombing the shit our of weaker countries around the world, in order to steal their resources for the sake of the big wall street corps. as well as getting rid of any "regime" that may even remotely pose a threat the the great state of Israel, our father, they you will have PLENTY of money to cover healthcare for ALL our citizens, esp. coupled with the wall street transaction tax.
